required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Claritin in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy of Claritin in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary goal of this study is to examine determinants of the efficacy of Claritin.

detailed_description.textblock: Subjects will be given Claritin 10mg tablet. Subjects will be challenged with histamine via skin prick prior to Claritin administration and at 1 and 2 hours post administration. We will measure and record wheal and flare area 10 minutes following each challenge.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Wheal Reaction Area From Baseline --- 2 Hour
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and 2 hours post administration of Claritin.
primary_outcome.description: A research technician, blinded to the subject's condition, measured the extent of the skin inflammation at baseline and 2 hours post Claritin administration by tracing the wheal reaction after the histamine challenge (i.e. the slightly reddened, elevated area at the site of the challenge, a well-established measure of histamine response). The percentage change in the wheal reaction was calculated as the change (decrease) in the size relative to baseline, multiplied by 100. Wheal area was measured in mm^2.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Wheal Reaction Area From Baseline --- 1 Hour
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and 1 hours post administration of Claritin
secondary_outcome.description: A research technician, blinded to the subject's condition, measured the extent of the skin inflammation at baseline and 1 hour post Claritin administration by tracing the wheal reaction after the histamine challenge (i.e. the slightly reddened, elevated area at the site of the challenge, a well-established measure of histamine response). The percentage change in the wheal reaction was calculated as the change (decrease) in the size relative to baseline, multiplied by 100. Wheal area was measured in mm^2.

arm_group.description: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Claritin.
Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Zyrtec.

intervention.description: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria.
1. Males and females between 18 and 65 years of age.
Exclusion Criteria.
1. Pregnant or lactating women.
2. Upper respiratory infection within 14 days of study start.
3. Women of childbearing potential not using specific contraception method(s) (i.e., birth control pills, depo Provera, double barrier) as well as women who are breastfeeding.
4. Patients with severe medical condition(s) that in the view of the investigator prohibits participation in the study (heart, lung, kidney, neurological, oncologic or liver disease).
5. Use of any other investigational agent in the last 30 days.
6. Use of medications that may affect skin testing. Specifically, subjects are excluded if they have used an antihistamine during the 4 days preceding their treatment visit.

group.title: Claritin Ads, Allergy+
group.description: Subject, with positive skin test to at least one common allergen (grass, trees, mold, dust mites, ragweed, cats), will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Claritin. Claritin: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet.

group.title: Zyrtec Ads, Allergy+
group.description: Subject, with positive skin test to at least one common allergen (grass, trees, mold, dust mites, ragweed, cats), will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Zyrtec. Claritin: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet.

group.title: Claritin Ads, Allergy-
group.description: Subject, without allergies, will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Claritin. Claritin: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet.

group.title: Zyrtec Ads, Allergy-
group.description: Subject, without allergies, will be given 10mg Claritin tablet and then watch a movie that includes commercials for Zyrtec. Claritin: Subject will be given 10mg Claritin tablet.

baseline.population: The sample was stratified into subjects with (Allergy+) and without (Allergy-) a positive skin test and block-randomized each subpopulation to the two advertisement conditions (Claritin ads and Zyrtec ads)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
